page.title: 07Where do people shop
page.content: Most people shop in Reditch. Around 24 that we inteviewed shoped at Redditch. They probably shop at Redditch because it is quite near and it has almost everything there. Alvechurch is the nearest town to rowney Green but only 3 people we interviewed went shopping in alvechurch. This was probably because Alvechurch is quite small and dosen't have many good shops.Birmingham is the nearest large city to Rowney Green. Most people who shop in Birmingham probably work there because only 3 people shop in Birmingham. Bromsgrove is a small town where 3 people shop but Bromsrove has more shops than Alvechurch but not as many as Redaitch. North field is another place were people shop North Field is the place were least people shop. In Solihull 3 people we asked shoped.
